casebody.data:
Marion WILSON, petitioner,
v.
Eric SELLERS, Warden. No. 16-6855. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 27, 2017.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit granted. Adam K. Mortara, Esquire, of Chicago, Illinois, is invited to brief and argue, as amicus curiae, in support of the judgment below.
